data.name: qryQuery.SelectStatement
data.value: SELECT WAB.WhAbrechnungID, MA = USR.NameVorname, FAL.FaFallID, FAL_BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID, WAB.Bemerkung, PER.NameVorname, PER.BaPersonID, WAB.DocumentID, WAB.UserID_AnfrageAn, NameVornameAn = USR_An.NameVorname, WAB.UserID_AnfrageVon, NameVornameVon = USR_Von.NameVorname, WAB.DatumAnfrage FROM WhAbrechnung WAB INNER JOIN FaFall FAL ON WAB.FaFallID = FAL.FaFallID INNER JOIN VwUser USR ON USR.BenutzerNr = FAL.UserID INNER JOIN VwPersonSimple PER ON PER.BaPersonID = WAB.BaPersonID LEFT JOIN VwUser USR_AN ON WAB.UserID_AnfrageAn = USR_AN.UserID LEFT JOIN VwUser USR_VON ON WAB.UserID_AnfrageVon = USR_VON.UserID WHERE WAB.WhAbrechnungVisumCode = 2 -- angefragt --- AND FAL.UserID = {edtWhSucheSARX.LookupID} --- AND FAL.BaPersonID = {edtWhSucheKlientX.LookupID} --- AND WAB.UserID_AnfrageVon = {edtWhSucheAbsenderX.LookupID} --- AND WAB.UserID_AnfrageAn = {edtWhSucheEmpfaengerX.LookupID}

data.name: edtWhSucheAbsenderX.LookupSQL
data.value: DECLARE @searchString NVARCHAR(200); -- akzeptierte Schreibweisen: -- name vorname -- name, vorname -- name,vorname -- logonname SELECT @searchString = REPLACE({0}, ', ', ' '); SELECT @searchString = REPLACE(@searchString, ',', ' '); SELECT [ID$] = UserID, [MA] = LastName + ISNULL(', ' + FirstName, ''), [Kürzel] = LogonName FROM dbo.XUser WITH(READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE LastName + ISNULL(' ' + FirstName, '') LIKE '%' + @searchString + '%' OR LogonName LIKE ({0} + '%') ORDER BY MA; ----

data.name: edtWhSucheKlientX.LookupSQL
edtWhSucheSARX.LookupSQL
data.value: DECLARE @searchString NVARCHAR(200) -- akzeptierte Schreibweisen: -- name vorname -- name, vorname -- name,vorname -- logonname SELECT @searchString = REPLACE({0}, ', ', ' '); SELECT @searchString = REPLACE(@searchString, ',', ' '); SELECT [ID$] = UserID, [MA] = LastName + ISNULL(', ' + FirstName, ''), [Kürzel] = LogonName FROM dbo.XUser WITH(READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE LastName + ISNULL(' ' + FirstName, '') LIKE '%' + @searchString + '%' OR LogonName LIKE ({0} + '%') ORDER BY MA; ----
